Your custom types have been added: 你的自定义类型被添加了
Save the type definitions for your custo: Save the type definitions for your custom structures as key-value pairs in a valid JSON file. The key should be the name of your custom structure and the value an object containing your type definitions.
Additional types as a JSON file (or edit: 附加类型为一个JSON文件(或者在下面编辑)
Override the default ss58 prefix for add: 生成地址时重载 ss58 前缀
Override the default identity icon displ: 用一个指定主题重来载默认的身份图标显示
Adjust the mode from basic (with a limit: Adjust the mode from basic (with a limited number of beginner-user-friendly apps) to full (with all basic & advanced apps available)
Manage your connection to Ledger S: 管理你的连接到 Ledger S
Select the remote endpoint, either from: 选择远程终端，或者通过自定义切换输入的手动下拉菜单中的任意一个
No upgradable extensions found: 没有需要升级的浏览器插件
Chain specifications: 生成含网络参数的二维码
Name of the network. It only for display: 网络名称，仅作为显示用
The color used to distinguish this netwo: 颜色用来和其他网络相区别，用3位或者6位的16进制码表示，比如#FFF或#111111
Genesis Hash refers to initial state of: 创世区块哈希代表网络的初始状态，在网络启动后不可改变
Unit decides the name of 1 unit token, e: 每一个token的单位，比如Polkadot的单位是DOT
Prefix indicates the ss58 address format: 地址前缀用0~255的数来来表示SS58地址的编码格式
Decimals decides the smallest unit of th: 小数代表每一单位token最小可以精确到多少位小数
